enterConf

public void enterConf(long nConfID)
    User request to enter conference. will call OnEnterConf function to indicate response.

Parameters:
nConfID - conference ID which user request to enter
See Also:
OnEnterConf(long, long, String, int), ConfRequestCallback

exitConf

public void exitConf(long nConfID)
    User request exit conference, this request no callback call.

Parameters:
nConfID - conference ID which user request to exit
See Also:
